message.raw:
Fixed a bug where the adwin could not program multiple cards of the same type simultaneously in static mode.
When setting once card, the others would go back to their defaults, or would start executing the last buffered run.
message.html:

When setting once card, the others would go back to their defaults, or would start executing the last buffered run.
